modName: RCRN v36  and Revamped exterior fog Compatibility Patch
summary:
A patch for RCRN 3.6 and Revamped exterior fog for better visual
Una patch per RCRN PURE e Revamped exterior fog
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=YellowGreen]My other mod[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36746//?]Apple Garden[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26286]SIS -Stealth and Immersion Set[/url]   [i][color=OrangeRed]featured on GEMS and now with Drop Gold[/color][/i]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27395]Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch[/url]
[line]
[i][size=6][color=orange][b]RCRN 3.6/Revamped Exterior Fog - Patch[/b][/color][/size][/i]

This mod allows to use changes brings from [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930]Revamped Exterior Fog[/URL] mod with the [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1875]RCRN 3.6[/URL] normally incompatibles.
It must be used instead of \"Revamped Exterior Fog\" mod that it\'s no longer necessary (for RCRN 3.5 and 3.6)
[color=yellow]Works with all RCRN presets[/color]

The changes are applied only during the days. See the images above
The nights is untouched and remains as in RCRN 3.6
For all languages no needs translations.
[color=Chartreuse]v3.6a cleaned with TES5edit[/color]

[color=red][size=3]Requires Skyrim version 1.8.151.0.7 or higher[/size][/color]

[color=green]INSTALLATION:[/color]
Copy the \"RCRN Revamped patch.esp\" in your \"Data\" folder and then put him, in the load order, AFTER \"rcrnShaders.esp\"

[color=green]DISINSTALLATION:[/color]
Remove \"RCRN Revamped patch.esp\" from your Data folder

[color=green]LOAD ORDER:[/color]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
....
rcrnShaders.esp
RCRN Revamped patch.esp
RCRNvolumetric.esp
....
[COLOR=teal]RECOMMENDED MOD[/COLOR]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/180]RCRN Plus - ENB by TheCompiler[/url]

[line]
[COLOR=orange][SIZE=6]ITALIANO[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Si tratta di una patch per RCRN 3.6 e Revamped exterior fog.
Rende le giornate più limpide e lascia le notti come nella versione della RCRN da voi scelta.
Può essere usato al posto di \"Revamped Exterior Fog\" che non è più necessario (per le versioni 3.5 e 3.6 della RCRN)
Per tutte le lingue
[color=Chartreuse]La versione 3.6a è stata pulita con TES5edit[/color]

[color=red][size=3]Richiede Skyrim 1.8.151.0.7 o maggiore[/size][/color]

[color=green]INSTALLAZIONE:[/color]
Copiate \"RCRN Revamped patch.esp\" nella vostra directory DATA e mettetelo nell\'ordine subito dopo \"rcrnShaders.esp\"

[color=green]DISINSTALLAZIONE:[/color]
Cancellate \"RCRN Revamped patch.esp\" dalla vostra directory DATA

[COLOR=teal]MOD RACCOMANDATI[/COLOR]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/180]RCRN Plus - ENB[/url]: the Compiler, l\'autore della STEP, ha inserito la mia patch all\'interno del suo lavoro. Se vi piacciono gli ENB dategli un\'occhiata

[color=yellow]IF YOU LIKE IT, PLEASE, \"ENDORSE\" IT ![/color]
Tanks to Lucasssvt for English text[/center]
author: improbabile
